author: RTÉ News
title: Thunberg: Crisis response shows world can act fast
description: Climate activist Greta Thunberg said the swift and far-ranging economic and social shifts brought in to stem the coronavirus pandemic showed that the rapid action needed to curb climate change was also possible.
content:
Climate activist Greta Thunberg said on Tuesday the swift and far-ranging economic and social shifts being brought in to stem the coronavirus pandemic showed that the rapid action needed to curb climate change was also possible.
